attack type: match on quasi-identifiers for specific individual
remedy: enforce $k$-anonymity for quasi-identifiers by binning  and suppression

attack type: match on demographic quasi-identifiers for specific group
disclosure when: sensitive values are homogeneous for quasi-identifiers
remedy: enforce $l$-diversity for sensitive values by suppression

attack type: match on partial quasi-identifiers and partial sensitive values for unknown individual
disclosure when: quasi-identifiers are homogeneous for certain sensitive values
remedy: enforce $l$-diversity for quasi-identifiers and specific, knowable sensitive values; bin

attack type: match on demographic quasi-identifiers for specific group
disclosure when: sensitive values are near homogeneous for quasi-identifiers and all of a similar severity
remedy: break crimes into violent-not violent; enforce $l$-diversity on that categorization
